Title: Home Page for Haym Hirsh
Body: Date: Mon, 25 Nov 1996 22:13:57 GMT Server: NCSA/1.5.2 Last-modified: Fri, 18 Oct 1996 16:25:19 GMT Content-type: text/html Content-length: 3577 Home Page for Haym Hirsh Haym Hirsh General Information Haym Hirsh spent the first quarter-century of his life in California , receiving his BS degree in 1983 from the Mathematics and Computer Science departments at UCLA and his MS in 1985 and PhD in 1989 from the Computer Science Department at Stanford University .
